titleInfo.title: 1834 Aug. 2, Columbus, McMinn C[oun[ty], E[ast] Tenn[essee] [to] Charles F. Welcker, Talladega Court house, Ala[bama]

mods.note: The following document is a letter dated August 2, 1834, written to Charles F. Welcker by his brother Frederick A. Welcker in McMinn County, TN. In the letter, Frederick writes of his departure from home in April and his journeys since across East Tennessee in search of employment.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
